mapper.sql: ID, ORDER_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, TRANS_VOL, RISK_LEVEL, STATUS, OPER_USER_ID, VERIFI_STRATEGY, NOTIFY_STRATEGY, SCORE, PAY_USER_ID, REC_USER_ID, PAY_BANK_CARD_NO, REC_TERMINAL_ID, REDUNDANT_FIELDS_1, REDUNDANT_FIELDS_2, REDUNDANT_FIELDS_3, CONTROL, BIZ_CODE, FRMS_DATA_TYPE, FRMS_TRANS_TIME, FRMS_TRANS_VOL, FRMS_OPER_STATUS, FRMS_ORDER_CHNL, FRMS_ORDER_TYPE, FRMS_TRADE_MODE, FRMS_TRADE_TYPE, FRMS_USER_ID, FRMS_USER_ID_CARD, FRMS_USER_TYPE, FRMS_BANK_CARD_NO, FRMS_COL_NAME, FRMS_COL_CARD_NO, FRMS_OPER_NO, FRMS_USER_NAME, FRMS_PAY_DETAIL, FRMS_TRADE_FROM, FRMS_TRADE_DEPART, FRMS_COL_CUST_ACCT, FRMS_FRE_ID, FRMS_SERIALS_NO, FRMS_BANK_CARD_TYPE, FRMS_CRY_TYPE, FRMS_BILL_FLAY, FRMS_TRADE_SRC, FRMS_MERCH_SEQ, FRMS_MERCH_STAT, FRMS_CDHP_BH, FRMS_DUE_DATE, FRMS_TRANS_STATUS, FRMS_CDHP_STATUS, FRMS_CDHP_AMT, FRMS_COMPANY_NAME, FRMS_OPER_NAME, FRMS_SIGN_DATE_NET, FRMS_SIGN_DATE_MOB, FRMS_SIGN_MOB_NUM, CHECKLIST_TYPE, FRMS_MERCH_NAME, RULES_CODE, FRMS_CUST_NAME, FRMS_USER_PHONE
mapper.insert:
SELECT CHECKLIST_SEQ.nextval as ID from DUAL
insert into CHECKLIST (ID, ORDER_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, TRANS_VOL, RISK_LEVEL, STATUS, OPER_USER_ID, VERIFI_STRATEGY, NOTIFY_STRATEGY, SCORE, PAY_USER_ID, REC_USER_ID, PAY_BANK_CARD_NO, REC_TERMINAL_ID, REDUNDANT_FIELDS_1, REDUNDANT_FIELDS_2, REDUNDANT_FIELDS_3, CONTROL, BIZ_CODE, FRMS_DATA_TYPE, FRMS_TRANS_TIME, FRMS_TRANS_VOL, FRMS_OPER_STATUS, FRMS_ORDER_CHNL, FRMS_ORDER_TYPE, FRMS_TRADE_MODE, FRMS_TRADE_TYPE, FRMS_USER_ID, FRMS_USER_ID_CARD, FRMS_USER_TYPE, FRMS_BANK_CARD_NO, FRMS_COL_NAME, FRMS_COL_CARD_NO, FRMS_OPER_NO, FRMS_USER_NAME, FRMS_PAY_DETAIL, FRMS_TRADE_FROM, FRMS_TRADE_DEPART, FRMS_COL_CUST_ACCT, FRMS_FRE_ID, FRMS_SERIALS_NO, FRMS_BANK_CARD_TYPE, FRMS_CRY_TYPE, FRMS_BILL_FLAY, FRMS_TRADE_SRC, FRMS_MERCH_SEQ, FRMS_MERCH_STAT, FRMS_CDHP_BH, FRMS_DUE_DATE, FRMS_TRANS_STATUS, FRMS_CDHP_STATUS, FRMS_CDHP_AMT, FRMS_COMPANY_NAME, FRMS_OPER_NAME, FRMS_SIGN_DATE_NET, FRMS_SIGN_DATE_MOB, FRMS_SIGN_MOB_NUM, CHECKLIST_TYPE, FRMS_MERCH_NAME, RULES_CODE,FRMS_CUST_NAME, FRMS_USER_PHONE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{transVol,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{riskLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{operUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{verifiStrategy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notifyStrategy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
